parameter.name: selectColumns
parameter.description: The selectColumns, specifies which modules and fields to be retrieved i.e, Leads(Last Name,Website,Email) OR All

parameter.name: fromIndex
parameter.description: Index number to retrieve records from , default value is 1

parameter.name: toIndex
parameter.description: Index number to retrieve records from (default value is 1 ,maximum vaLue is 200)

parameter.name: lastModifiedTime
parameter.description: Specifies the datetime, where modified data will be fetched after the configured time(format: yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss )

parameter.name: newFormat
parameter.description: The newFormat, an integer determine weather null valus should be excluded(1) or included(2)

parameter.name: module
parameter.description: Specifies the module to retrieve data from
